title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rebound to close higher as investors weigh flurry of earnings reports - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rebound to close higher as investors weigh flurry of earnings reports  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks rallied Tuesday, clawing back from a rough start to the week as investors assessed a deluge of earnings reports for clues on how corporate America has fared against a backdrop of war in Eastern Europe and rising inflationary pressures.
